title: Which technology project is suitable for a high school student? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tey for something like making a model of a device that can perform a certian task or can be used for some simple works but should be related to technology. Try making from a phone or any gadjects. Try using some othrr tools to be used with gadjects. Eg. Selfie stick simple. But don't make that go for something new.
